00028 template<class CFG> struct OOScript : public Script<CFG> {
00029         typedef typename Script<CFG>::Value Value;
00030         typedef typename Script<CFG>::String String;
00031         typedef typename Script<CFG>::StringIt StringIt;
00032         typedef typename Script<CFG>::Exception Exception;
00033         typedef typename Script<CFG>::Native Native;
00034         typedef typename Script<CFG>::Frame Frame;
00035         
00036         template<class C> class CppObject : public Native {
00037                 public:         CppObject(C* o) : o(o) { }
00038                 public:         virtual ~CppObject() { delete o; }
00039                 protected:      C* o;
00040         };
00041 
00046         class FullRoot : public Script<CFG>::FullRoot {
00047                 public:         FullRoot() { addOONatives(*this); }
00048         };
00049         
00066         static std::pair<Value, String> getThisAndMethod(Frame& frame) {
00067                 const String fn = frame.get(STR("$callee"));
00068                 StringIt it = std::find(fn.rbegin(), fn.rend(), '.').base();
00069                 if (it <= fn.begin()) throw Exception(STR("Non-method call"));
00070                 Frame* previous = frame.getPrevious();
00071                 assert(previous != 0);
00072                 return std::pair<Value, String>(previous->reference(String(fn.begin(), it - 1)), String(it, fn.end()));
00073         }
00074         
00075         static Value elevate(Frame& frame) { return frame.execute(frame.get(getThisAndMethod(frame).first, true)); }
00076         static void addOONatives(Frame& frame) { frame.registerNative(STR("elevate"), elevate); }
00077 
00078 }; // struct OOScript

00080 typedef OOScript<StdConfig> StdOOScript;
